Over 26 million will be allocated in the Rostov region to support the population on social projects
This is planned for February. The order was signed by the Governor of Vasili of the Blues.
09:39, 16 February
Road repairs in Volgograd will cost 140 million
The corresponding lot is located on the public procurement portal. The contractor will have to maintain the status of the sites in four areas.
09:26, 16 February
Russia told us how to form a financial cushion.
Not all Rossiians have job losses, but having a financial security cushion is very important, the candidate for economic sciences, the financial analyst, Michael Bellaev.

Russia, which has money in the rubles, is awaiting a new ban since 16 February.
Russian citizens with money in rubles were warned of a new ban since 16 February 2024. If you ignore him, you can lose the savings.

Turkish Denizbank started asking some Russian citizens for documents on the VAW.
One of the largest banking organizations Turkey Denizbank sent a mass mail to RF clients requesting documents confirming the right to reside in Turkey.
23:04, 15 February
RF RB: the average maximum contribution rate has decreased to 14.83 per cent
The average peak interest rate for decoration deposits in the country ' s top 10 banking organizations, as a result of the first December 2024, declined to 14.83 per cent.
21:42, 15 February
RSF stated that the actual effective course of the rouble increased by 2.4 per cent in January
At the Central Bank, the Russian Federation stated that the real effective rate of Russian national currency had increased by 2.4 per cent as a result of January 2024 in relation to the currencies of the key trading partners of Russia.
20:27, 15 February
The United States dollar in Mosbirje exceeded 92 roubles for the first time since 9 February
The United States exchange rate on the Moscow Exchange increased by 0.65% or 0.59 copies on 15 February, surpassing 92 roubles for the first time since 9 February. Euro cost 0.82% to 98.73 roubles.
19:25, 15 February
The killers dropped the budget of Astrahan province by millions of roubles
In 2023, 200,000 people were travelling on new buses. If you multiply it on 31 rubles, there'll be a huge mistrust.
19:12, 15 February
Traider Kaminski: RF RCB should explain to the Rossians how to work with cryptate
The Central Bank identified potential investments in cryptitude, but the issue of investor ability to adequately assess risks remains open. At the same time, the trader and Miner Evgeny Kaminski stated that in the coming years the market could benefit from the federal fiscal revenue. However, it is important to explain to citizens how to work with cryptism.
18:28, 15 February
In Krasnodar, business interactions were discussed
The event was honoured by the 25th anniversary of enterprise monitoring. Business leaders, the authorities and the banking system participated.
17:42, 15 February
Yurist Pirogov explained how to save credit in 2024.
Since January 2024, the rules for the granting of credit have been amended, as was the case with the lawyer Sergei Pirogov.
16:01, 15 February
Cuban developer USC is recognized as bankrupt
15:30, 15 February
The CB stated that there would be no computing unit
In the Central Bank, it is confident that investments made in cryptitude may harm the financial system.
14:09, 15 February
The capitalization of the Kaliningrad FRP exceeded 1.3 billion roubles
The Minister of Economic Development, Industry and Trade of the Veronica Lesicoa region spoke about the capitalization of the Kaliningrad Industrial Development Fund over 1.3 billion roubles. This was shared at the Russian exhibition in Moscow.
13:49, 15 February
Bashkiria pay increased by almost 15 per cent
The average nominal accrued salary in Bashkiria increased by 14.9 per cent. The indicator reached 55,169 roubles.
13:10, 15 February
There will be a farmer in Don's towns.
They are deployed in the cities of Azov and Shahta. Large fairs will be held on a weekend.
12:52, 15 February

In a year, demand for cold locomotive increased by 37%. Such data were provided in the “North Sign”.
